title: eDiscovery + Document Review
description: A workflow for fast triage, prioritization, and defensible review notes.
checklist: Define relevance, privilege, and confidentiality criteria
Triage and prioritize documents (time, parties, topics)
Extract key facts and create defensible review notes
Compile exhibit candidates and gaps for follow-up discovery
risk_notes: Treat privilege as a first-class requirement; keep review boundaries explicit.
Do not use consumer tools for sensitive data without approval.

seo.title: eDiscovery Playbook
seo.description: A defensible eDiscovery workflow with tools and a structured review checklist.
